entities.name: NVIDIA
entities.description: NVIDIA is a technology company that experienced a security incident involving unauthorized access to its network by independent criminal threat actors on February 23, 2022. The threat actors obtained NVIDIA network credentials, two-factor authentication capability, and misappropriated proprietary information, including source code, leaking some online. NVIDIA took remedial and preventative actions, rotated network credentials, hardened its network, analyzed exfiltrated information, and notified law enforcement.
